name: Brush With Death (Shannyn Boyd, yeoyeo, WenFang, DislexicDragon)
name_original: Brush With Death (Shannyn Boyd, yeoyeo, WenFang, DislexicDragon)
description:
Brush With Death is a two-player cooperative game where one player controls a ninja that can hide in the shadows and the other player controls a faerie that can direct light and create shadows.

Dark objects disappear in shadows and light objects disappear in direct faerie light. The ninja can hide from enemies in the shadows.
